choices: "Hello there, you cute little creature! How'd you get in my mane?" :3

125.content:
Surreal as it is to have a cartoon unicorn's rather prodigious rump coming down on you, your survival instincts still recognized the threat of an incoming hazard from above. With a little yelp, you dive out the shadow cast by Twilight's descending flank mere seconds before she sits down. If you hadn't moved, you'd have been pancaked instantly--a heck of a way to go, but you preferred survival to a memorable death. And lucky for you, it seemed "Dead By Equine Posterior" wouldn't be in your obituary. (Even if Twilight DID have a pleasant-looking behind, as far as giant purple unicorns went.)

Unfortunately, your timing couldn't have been worse: the same instant you landed on the cushion, Twilight had fully sat down...the impact of which sent you flying off of the chair, up towards the unicorn's head. During your impromptu flight, you catch sight of her--what else--reading a book, utterly engrossed in the text. She looked pretty cute like that, so enthusiastic over her book.

But once again, survival prevailed over cuteness. Trying to control your areal tumble, you make a grab for the closest thing you can--a strand of Twilight's mane. You snatch the purple-and-pink lifeline, and hold on for dear life! You were going so fast that your momentum carries you forward, swinging on Twilight's mane like some tiny Tarzan. Well, maybe not Tarzan. You doubted if he ever swang from a vine treated with flower-scented shampoo.

Okay...this was starting to get fun! You let out a giddy laugh, whooping with adrenaline.

The hairs you'd grabbed on to were long enough to partially wrap around Twilight's head--and make you lose your grip at the apex of the arc, sliding off her mane and falling right onto the book Twilight was reading, your landing making a little thud! on the paper.

Finally still, and not sensing any danger, you burst out laughing between pants. "Well, that was...a lot of fun!" You exult. "I almost wish I could do...that...again?" Another shadow covers you, and you look up in fear....

...And find Twilight Sparkle looking down at you, her purple eyes wide. Even sitting down, she towered over you--you had to be the size of a grain of rice compared to her. Maybe this wasn't so much fun, after all.

Twilight blinked in surprise at your sudden appearance, cocking her head to one side. She leaned in, examining you closely--too closely, making you yelp again and scramble back in fear. She wasn't showing any signs of anger or hostility, but you instincts still kicked in; having a she-creature who was hundreds of feet tall from your perspective was unnerving, no matter how cute she was.

Twilight giggled at your frantic reaction, pulling her head back to give you space. Holding her smile, she says....
125.title: Awkward Introductions

132.content:
You approached the noise that you assumed came from a person. It took a very long time but once you got close enough to view who made the racket, you stopped in your tracks in the grass-filled landscape.

It was an orange mare with a stetson upon her head. She had emerald green eyes and freckles on each cheek. You recognized her as Applejack, from My Little Pony. She kicked another mountainous tree, causing apples to fall from the protruding branches. Applejack stepped away from the tree, and sighed before wiping a bead of sweat off of her face with one of her dirty forelegs.

Applejack then began to walk away from the tree. You gasped when you realized that she was walking in your direction. If you didn't run, you would get stepped on and then never seen again, squished beneath her sweaty, muscular hooves. It was likely that even she wouldn't notice your mushed form afterwards.

1322.content: You turned around, and sprinted off in the opposite direction. You heard thumping from behind you, most likely from Applejack's gigantic hooves trampling the tree-sized grass and bugs beneath them. It caused your breathing to quicken, and you turned around to gaze at the approaching mare. She got ever closer, as her massive form outran you by merely slowly walking. Her gaze never even looked down once, and when you turned your head to face forwards, you noticed a root ahead of you. You ran into the root, and then turned around to look at the giant mare behind you, moving ever closer... slowly coming to squash you like an insignificant bug.
1322.title: Run in the opposite direction.

13221.content:
You continued to stare at Applejack. You felt slightly hypnotized by the mare, and sooner or later... it was too late to run.

You took a few steps back, and bumped back into the root. You instantly were reminded of the root, and then you fell to your knees, cowering in fear that formed within you by the simplest of gaze.

Applejack's fore hooves went right over you, and you heard the air rushing by as you looked up at them. Hope built within you once more, but after you turned around to face her hind hooves going over you, you saw that one was coming down upon you...

You tried to scream, but you lost all the willpower to do so...

The dirty, sweat covered hoof stepped down onto you. For a moment, you thought that the hoof wouldn't sink into the ground and force itself onto you. You were in the humid frog, after all... but the dirt and mud pushed around her hoof, and it sunk into the soil. You put your hands upon her hoof, trying to force against it, but your efforts proved useless once your arms were pushed back down next to you.

You moaned, trying to get her attention, but you knew it wasn't going to work...

The hoof then fully applied itself to you,
13221.title: Cower and stare at Applejack.

132211.content:
You cried out in pain once the hoof slowed but kept forcing itself down. You gasped for air once you found you could hardly breathe anymore. You tried to move around, but found yourself incapable as your body was pinned down and crushed. In your last efforts to get her attention, you tried licking her hoof to perhaps make her feel something from a living thing. It only helped fill your mouth and coat your tongue with a salty liquid -- sweat, and you tried to cough up and spit out the dirt, but you weren't able to even heave... you were then smeared beneath her dirt and sweat coated hoof before your body popped and your innards were plastered against her hoof. The stain was minimal, and barely noticeable. It mixed with the dirt and sweat well enough to look like it was just debris from the ground. With every step Applejack took, your squished form became even less recognizable.

Applejack kept moving along to the next tree, feeling nothing but a slight 'pop' beneath the hoof. It aroused her curiosity, but she didn't look. Applejack assumed it was a small piece of rubbish, or perhaps a bug, but she thought that she would just clean it off later...

She prepared her hindquarters to kick the next tree, and once she kicked it, the small mush that was left of you fell from the hoof and down to the ground to decompose and never be found again...

1323.title: Stand still.

choices: Rarity, busy with her latest project.
Coco Pommel (From S4 ep, "Rarity Takes Manehattan")
Fancy Pants and Fluer di Lis?
14.content:
The first thing you notice when you wake up is...well, that you woke up. You didn't remember going to sleep; heck, your clearest memory is walking down the street, in broad daylight! So what the heck happened?

Sitting up, you rub your aching head and blink the..sleep? Knocked-out-ness?...from your eyes, and look around for some clues on what happened--

Or rather, you try to look around, but can't believe what you're seeing. You think it's just a trick of the light, or that you're still not really awake and imagining things...but the longer you stare at the spools of fabric, the sketches of various fancy outfits--for both genders, though ladies' wear was the majority by far--and the pony-shaped mannequins, it gets harder and harder to doubt what you see:

You're in the one and only Carousel Boutique! And you doubt that this is a hallucination (for one thing, you're lucid enough to doubt it's real for a moment, so your brain is working fine), but there's still one glaring detail that keeps you rooted where you sit, staring wide-eyed: everything looked enormous: the desk you were on alone could host a soccer game with room to spare, and the sewing machine nearby was easily the size of a barn, maybe a little bigger. The supply-shelves along the walls were as big as radio towers--and that wasn't even touching on the entire room.

The place looked big enough to fit an aircraft carrier!

Needless to say, the effect was impressive.

You manage to stand up, rubbing your temples and giving yourself a pep-talk. "Okay...so somehow I find myself in a giant version of Carousel Boutique--or I shrank somehow and this is normal-sized--and however I got here apparently knocked me unconscious. I'll save my fanboy Brony freak-out for later, though...first I have to find some help."

No sooner do those words pass your lips than your ears pick up a loud noise approaching. It's a series of rhythmic thud-thud-thuds, almost like footsteps! You put two and two together, and your eyes go wide once again.

"Oh, right. Giant Carousel Boutique, implies giant ponies. Really freaking BIG giant ponies."

Not bothering to hide or move--what would be the point?--You simply watch as the far door swings open with a slight creak, revealing the towering form(s) of...
14.title: Carousel Boutique

choices: Looks like you're going to be a stain
141.content:
You look up and see the giant pony beauty heading your way, you look at awe at her features. You noticed how her mane bounced lightly with every giant step she took, you watched her tail swing back and forth, you looked at her giant flank while she walked your way. You looked away and took a look in her eyes but only for a moment and you zoned back out on her flank again.

"Eww a bug I better squish it!" She screams, the scream leaving you with a pounding headache beyond belief, she raises her hoof and mutters something to herself you heard her say disgusting bug but not the rest.

"Wait!!! Rarity don't crush me!" You scream but does she hear you?
141.title: Rarity, busy with her latest project.

1412.content:
You were still a little in shock from her loud voice, you didn't even notice your body hovering above the ground.

"You disgusting little thing, I'll enjoy this I thought you bugs learned your lesson but I guess not I'll make sure with you." She said dropping you to the ground.

You can't even get up you think she shattered a few bones so you just lay there staring up at the beauty, you convince yourself it's not a such a bad way to go. But you have no idea what's about to happen.

"Well well to stupid to run?" She asked only giving off a laugh knowing you couldn't move. She looked down at you in disgust as she raised one of her hoofs above your legs she managed to only crush one. You scream in pain but she doesn't hear you, as she begins to twist her hoof on your leg causing every bone to crack and shatter. Before your leg turned into paste and blood she let up and repeated it to the next one giggling and stomping on it a few times.

She than starts to flick your torso causing the rips to crack, she gives you a smile that sends chills down your spine.

"Oh you little bugs don't deserve to be killed by such beauty and grace but, because you're going to die I'll let you in on something I enjoy killing you little guys. You disgusting pest are nothing before me she put pressure on your chest causing it to crack you just gurgled in pain.

She waved her hoof in front of you and said a funny remark for herself.

"Take a good look of this hoof insect this will be the thing that kills you." She said lowering it to you but not stomping, you take a deep breath and smell the dirty hoof the smell of sweat and other disgusting odors.

She raises it again and than stomps you into a flat paste your body easily cracked underneath her hoof, she just sat there and twisted your body into nothing, she lifted her hoof and looked at your remains nothing more than a little red stain on her hoof. She stomped on it some more laughing as she did it only to twist it again. She spat on your body and just left your stain on her hoof and floor for the day. She walked on you for a few days just laughing to herself how much fun you were to torture, she almost felt like you weren't an insect but than she just laughed as anything below her was merely just an insect. So that's how you died mistaken and renamed to nothing more than a mere bug.
1412.title: Looks like you're going to be a stain

choices: Rarity sees you. (maybe saved, maybe fucked. Who knows? Readers choice here)
143.content:
Well, well, well looks like you. are. (maybe) FUCKED. But maybe there is some miracle.


DID you escape or are you gonna be cat food?
143.title: Opal, Rarity's cat. (Uh-oh...)

15.content: due to limits on chapter one I had to make a separate chapter.
15.title: more options.

152.content: Let's start off by listing the most obvious ones and go from there.
152.title: Canterlot

choices: The Giant Was Just Shuffling Around in Her Bed
The Giant is Entering the Room
1522.content:
You wake up in a daze, rubbing your throbbing head. You think that you hit your head on the headboard of your bed. But upon reaching your hand out to touch your headboard, you feel nothing there. In fact, you can't feel the "My Little Pony" covers of your bed either.

"Wh-What the hell?" you say to yourself. "Where am I?!"

You feel around on what you WERE on, and find that it is a very soft, silky surface. It was even a little bouncy too. Getting your mid off of your situation for a bit, you stand up on this surface, and bounce around on it, playfully giggling as you do. It was almost as fun as a moon bounce. Where ever you thought these kidnappers took you, it sure was enjoyable.

You decided to pan around the area, and what you saw was kinda odd. 3 weird looking mountains in a row stood very close to you. You bounce over to them and saw that they stood at least 20 feet taller than you. You touch them, and find that they are not made of rock, but something a little like..... glass. You could see that where the "mountains" lowered, they wrapped around the long field of that bouncy fabric.

"It's like a giant glass slipper" you thought. This really got you to wonder where the hell you were, so you decide to leap off the weird object, and onto the floor. But what you landed on seemed to be like large stalks of fabric, that went halfway up your body, at least up to your waist.

"Okay, this is really getting weird. Where am I?" you said, and turned to pan the room again. By now, your eyes adjusted to the dark, and what you saw, made your jaw drop. The object you thought was a giant slipper, was just that, a gigantic slipper. And it looked like there were 3 others bunched up with each other. You looked around even more, and saw what looked to be dressers the size of skyscrapers, a decorative rug the size of a track meet field, and a bed the size of a White Star Liner.

"E-Everything is so HUGE!" you yelled in surprise. You decide to pinch yourself, and it hurts. You obviously are NOT dreaming. "Where am I? A-At some movie set...... or d-did I really shrink?"

*RUMBLE*

Then the room started to quake beneath your feet. Judging by the size of everything, you knew that the owner of this room, had to be a giant, and a BIG one at that. You didn't know where to go. You didn't want to hide in the slippers, you knew you would get crushed if you did. You could only stand and hope the giant didn't see you. Though you were as small as an ant, how would he...... or not to your knowledge, she.
1522.title: Princess Luna

15223.content:
Noticing a burst of light from a wind you can deduct that it is daytime, when most ponies are out and about; although you are tired and exhausted. the first order is to find a place to hide as the door opens, you ran to a bookshelf and hid within.

a pony with a dark flowing mane that spoke in a loud voice entered, and screamed something about sleep and her name being Luna "The Princess of the Night".. you need sleep as well, but also a plan and decide to consider options. this pony clearly is about a night her job was a night time one. her voice and rank could prove a potent ally as well, however if she is my foe then I'd have to run. The first need is to sleep you will make a decision during the night. will you make an attempt go persuade this pony to help you?
15223.title: The Giant is Entering the Room

152231.content:
You decided to try to seek this pony's aid if you have any chance to survive... you just hope that she doesn't try to crush you like a bug before you have a chance to beg for her help.

So, choosing to sleep inside one of the slippers for the night, you slept relatively well despite the strange but nice smell of the slipper's insole. As daylight is slowly being replaced with moonlight, you woke up when you heard a rumbling sound as you see the dark pony's hoof approach you. It pins you down into the slippers insole as she adjusts the slipper to fit her hoof.

You were surprised that the hoof that is pinning you down is surprisingly soft despite knowing that hooves are suppose to be hard. And it had a rather mild scent to it that is neither repulsive nor aromatic.

But you shook your head to clear those thoughts as you focus on seeking the help of this pony giantess. You doubt that she can hear you in your current size and your voice being muffled by both her hoof and her slipper. But the the sooner you get help, the sooner you can get restored to normal size.

What do you do?
152231.title: Make an attempt

1522311.content:
You bit down hard, but not hard enough to break the skin, on the hoof. It tastes salty and there is a hint of dirt on it. But you got the desired effect as you hear the dark pony give out a yelp and a slight jump as she quickly removed the slipper where her hoof got bitten.

You breathed in a quick whiff of fresh air before the slipper was flipped over and you fell out of it and into the magical field that the dark pony erected around you before bringing you to her face, her eyes narrowing a little as she studied you.

Trapped and helpless; you can only close your eyes tightly and hoped that she would not mistake you for a bug.

The dark pony opened her mouth to say:
1522311.title: Bite her hoof

choices: "Of course I will help you." She replied with a smile
"Actually... I think I will keep you like this." She replied with a evil smirk
15223112.content:
"Who are thou?" The dark pony giantess asked as you float in her magical field. Sighing in relief that you would not be crushed, you think fast on your response.

"My name is [insert name here] and I am a human." You replied to her as loud as your tiny form could allow.

"A hooman? We've never heard of thine kind before. We are Princess Luna, Princess of the Night and raiser of the moon!" The dark pony, now called Princess Luna, exclaimed with a hint of pride in her voice.

Princess Luna looks at you as she thinks.

"Why are thou so small?" Princess Luna asked.

"I... I don't know. I remember being asleep in my bed and next thing I know, I woke up here in this strange land with no idea on how I got here." You explained to her in much detail as you possibly can.

Princess Luna was silent as she processed this information. You decided to use this opportunity to ask for her help.

"Would you help me get back to normal size your majesty?" You asked her in a hopeful manner.

Princess Luna looked at you, a strange glint in her eye as she replied:
15223112.title: "Who are you?"

choices: A night at Night Court underneath Luna's hoof
Skip to Luna's room after Night Court
152231122.content:
You can only stare up at her in pure shock as you processed her words.

"W-What?" You stuttered as Princess Luna's smirk grew wider.

"Thou heard me, I think I will keep thou as a pet." She answered as you begin shaking in the magical field holding you in the air.

"But I am not a pet! I'm a living being!" You shouted at her, although it sounds like high pitched squeaks from Luna's point of view.

"I believe thou does not have much of a choice hooman." Luna replied as she levitated you to the slipper that you bit her hind hoof on, dropping you in there.

You can only look up as Luna's giant smiling face fills the slippers entrance.

"Now, when I put my hoof in the slipper I expect thou to lick and massage it as I go fulfill my duties in Night Court. If thou does not, thou will be punished for disobedience." Luna proclaimed as she pushed her hoof inside the slipper, pinning you to the insole.

Luna taps her hoof as if saying "I'm waiting." Knowing that you do not have much of a choice and didn't want to risk whatever punishment that Luna would inflict on her tiny 'pet' you obediently licked her soft hoof and used your tiny body to massage her hoof as best you can. Luckily for you, her hoof doesn't taste that bad but you don't know how long that will last.

Princess Luna lets out a pleased sigh as she feels your tiny tongue lapping at her hoof and your tiny body squirming underneath it as she walks to her Night Court with a bit more pep in her steps.
152231122.title: "Actually... I think I will keep you like t...

1523.content: Of course, there are a lot of other royal ponies!
1523.title: More...

15233.content: So, not castle. Maybe streets?
15233.title: More!

155.content: due to limits on the previous chapter I had to make another chapter for choices.
155.title: more options.

1552.content: You woke up on a cold, crystally-like floor. You could see dirt and other filth everywhere around you. When you recovered enough from your dizziness, you looked up and, you couldn't believe it. Everything around was made out of crystals. But there was something odd. Everything seemed so huge. The ceiling was at least one kilometer high and in the distance, you could see something, that looked like a throne for a giant. You tried to get to it, but before you could go there, you heard a really loud noises, which sounded like hoofsteps. You turned around and you a giant equine creature. You then realized it was......
1552.title: Crystal Empire

15521.content: It was Cadance, Princess of the Crystal Empire and a wife to Shining Armor. She was so huge! Her hoofsteps were like an earthquake. You noticed that she was coming your way and you were size of an ant! You started running away from her path and tried to dodge those hooves that are size of a small football groud. When you were close to escape, she raised her hoof right above you and slammed it down. You were fortunately fast runner and dodge it, but shockwave that that hoofstomp did was too much for you, you were sent into the air and you lost consciousness. When you regain your senses, you found out that you landed.....
15521.title: The Goddes of Love

155212.content: You awoke to be out on the floor underneath Cadences throne, you look up and notice the giant is sitting there. You take a note that you were right that the throne was made to seat a giant but instead it was a giantess pony. You stood up and took a few mental notes and made sure nothing was broke, you looked up and noticed you were right underneath her hooves. You thought of your options and they were either be a stain on her hoof or get her help one ended in being smeared across her hoof while the other was dangerous make your choice time is ticking.....
155212.title: Onto the floor

choices: Cadence knows you were there and wants you as her hoof slave
Cadence doesn't know you are there and this is just random
1552121.content: Cadence's hoof comes crashing down on top of you, but despite all the pressure you are still alive. You wonder how this is possible as you look around under her hoof. All of a sudden she begins twisting her hoof over you as if she knew you were there and liked you there. Suddenly the pressure increases as she stands fully. An outside observer would see almost no change other then one of her hooves twisting a little.
1552121.title: Ehh to slow

15521211.content:
"Well well it looks like we have a little human here." Cadence said beaming as she lifted your stomped on body. "It's a good thing I had a protection spell on you." She smiled.

"Wha...what do you want with me?" You stutter out.

"Simple you as my hoof slave where you will spend most of your time licking off the dirt from my hooves. A bunch of other fun stuff for me." She said looking at you.

"And if I refuse?" You asked. You felt your body be released and you plumet to the ground the spell kept you alive. You heard two huge thunders as she removes her royal slippers.

"If you refuse you will be a stain here." She said pointing to her hoof. She placed it over your body. "You have 15 seconds lick if you accept my offer." She said. You took a deep breath and breathed in tbe stench of her hooves. Time is ticking...
15521211.title: Cadence knows you were there and wants you as h...

choices: Put you in a shoe and use you as an insole
Make you clean all her hooves
155212111.content:
After some time had passed, you took decided to lick the smelly pink hoof of the princess. It actually didn't taste that bad.

Cadence smirked down at you, "Looks like my tiny human knows his place. Now lick it some more."

She pressed her hoof down on you a few times to taunt you. The pressure thankfully didn't do any damage. You went ahead and cleaned her hoof as your mistress commanded you.

The pink princess then said to you, "Stop." You complied.

"Now, what to do with you?..."
155212111.title: Lick

1552121112.content:
"Well, I have a lot of paperwork to do right now. So how about you make yourself useful and clean the rest of my hooves" Cadence said
She didn't wait for you to answer before moving her other hind hoof over you, pressing down on you lightly.
"Lick" She said in a commanding tone.
You quickly obey her, not wanting to upset the gigantic Princess who held your life under her hoof. Luckily her hoof wasn't very dirty, and it had a fairly sweet perfumed scent to it. You figured that as royalty Cadence would maintain a very good hygiene. There was still some dust and a few small clumps of dirt that you had to lick up along with the salty sweat though and the casual movements of Cadence's hoof pressing into you kept interrupting your work. Eventually Cadence ordered you to stop as her hoof lifted into the air, before you could stand you felt a warm tingling sensation across your body as a magical aura surrounded you and you where lifted high into the air to be dropped onto the armrest (or hoofrest in this case) of the throne.
Cadence didn't even look your way as she focused on her scrolls, instead she casually moved her forehoof over your body and pressed you into the hoofrest.
You instinctively started licking, noticing that her forehoof was actually a little softer and less sweaty then her hindhooves. It was more comfortable as well to be pressed into the plush of the throne as opposed to the hard crystal ground.
By the time you finished her first forehoof you felt very tired as well as a bit sick from swallowing all the dirt and sweat but you console yourself by remembering that you only have one hoof left.
Cadence then orders you to stop and magically moves you to the next hoofrest and presses her other forehoof into you for you to lick.
After a good while you finally finished cleaning the Princess' hooves and she smiled down at you.
"I'm actually impressed, most humans are more resistant at first. But you seem to be quite submissive, a very good trait in a human." Princess Cadence said as she casually brushed you off of her hoofrest, causing you to tumble to the ground. Luckily the protective spell meant that you where unharmed but you where still pretty startled.
"Now, as a reward for your good service, I have decided to let you choose what to do next"
1552121112.title: Cleaning Cadence's hooves

choices: Climb her right hoof or left hoof
1552122.content: You think about getting her help, but your the size of a ant so it might be very hard to do so. You think about yelling her name and jumping up and down, so you proceed to do so. While your making huge noise that only you hear, the princess let's out a sigh of boredom not even aware of your existence, you think of two other options.. Either continue to stay there and make a noise, or climb one of her hooves
1552122.title: Get her help

15523.content: You noticed that you still weren't fully recovered from your dizziness and you still couldn't make out, who it was. You try to focus really hard and you notice it's....
15523.title: More?

1553.content: Still haven't found where you're looking for? Perhaps you ended up in a changeling hive?
1553.title: More options

15531.content: What time period are you in?
15531.title: Changeling hive

choices: what harm can those girls cause?
15532.content: How about the CMC tree house?
15532.title: No changelings for me.(more choices)

155321.content: Okay one thing first do you want all the crusaders or just one?
155321.title: what harm can those girls cause?

1553212.content: First up Applebloom the youngest member of the apple family.
1553212.title: First up: Applebloom

15532121.content:
You shake your head after trying to figure out what just happened. First you were at your home when something knocked you out. Now here you are, looking around and finding yourself in a strange greenish blue, wooden plain that goes on to the horizon. You see strange objects in the distant, but you can't make it out. Unfortunately, you could not do anything as you felt tremors. You felt another one, only stronger, and the feeling repeat itself over and over. That when you hear a thunderous creaking behind you. You turn around and gulp as you see a huge.

Huge might be a understatement as you saw a yellow pony, with a red mane and pink bow, so huge, her hoof alone could level a mountains and not notice. You must be a speck, most likely smaller, to this pony. Things got worse as you watch the titanic pony walking towards you. You try to get out of its walking path, but her steps shakes your world so much you bounce on the spot. It did not took the gigantic pony to be directly on top of you. You look up and see her terrifying hoof hovering above you. looking at the hoof, it could cover many miles, and its heading to you. You cover your eyes as the hoof descends above you.
15532121.title: AppleTitan in the treehouse

15532122.content: How about Sweetie Belle Rarity's little sister?
15532122.title: Next Up: Sweetie Bele

choices: Next: Babs Seed The only other CMC member we know of
Other (for when other members get introduced
155321222.content: Next up is Rainbow's biggest fan & little sister, Scootaloo.
155321222.title: Next Up: Scootaloo

1553212223.title: Other (for when other members get introduced

info.brief_description: You end up in the world of Equestria...Shrunk.
info.description:
There was a similar thing released a long time ago but the user deleted his account.

One day you wake up in Equestria, the Land from MLP:FIM, you are shrunk.

Rules.
1. Keep it focused MLP:FIM.
2. PLEASE use decent grammar.
3. feel free to add
4. There is zero tolerance for racism,sexism, discrimination, etc..
5. Please don't spam, or advertising.
6. Feel free to have fun.
